author: philip
msg: Fix locking problem with updates of missing directories.  This is probably
not perfect since restored directories give feedback 'A' while files give
feedback 'Restored'.  However I believe it reverts the behaviour to that
which existed before the locking changes.
this test and disable only the bits that don't work.

author: philip
msg: Fix locking problem with merges that delete files or directories.  Simplify
the handling of locked directories that get deleted.
Remove open and close of access baton.
baton parameter.  Open and close an access baton if required.  Pass access
(remove_lock): Allow administrative directory to have been deleted.
(add_with_history): Enable this test by working around a testing bug.

author: sussman
msg: Factorize the parsing code out of dav_svn_get_resource into a
standalone utility function.  This makes it possible for external
systems to discover which repository paths are being accessed -- by
asking mod_dav_svn to partially "decode" the opaque URIs coming in.
'has_repos_path' fields for each special subdir, so we can easily
parse right pass the junk without calling the real parsing routines.
(dav_svn_split_uri): new factorized routine to return all uri pieces.
